page.title: 09HOUSES OLD AND NEW
page.content: The houses on Peebles Close are 2 years old but those on Sheridan Street are 50_55 years old .The houses on Peebles Close have cavity walls . They have trusses on the roof and have concrete tiles. 4 houses on Peebles Close have sheds and 5 have garages. There are 14 houses on Peebles Close. All the houses are detached. They have good insulation.On Sheridan St there is a block of terraced houses a block of 4 and 2 detached. They used to have an outside toilet but lately have been modernised. They have traditional timber roofs with clay tiles. They are council houses. The modern houses have bigger gardens than the old ones but don't have chimneys like the old houses do. This is because old houses used to have coal fires and new houses don't because smoke isn't allowed to pollute the air. By Colin and Paul.
